OOC: Okay.  Still works though, because Tucson doesn't know that it's left =
his body just yet.  Last he knew he still had it.. Good thing he didn't rem=
ember anything after his first major injury.  It works out.  He'll find out=
 when he finds him I guess.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...>=
 wrote:
>
> OOC: the matrix isnt inside Rodimus is insinde of one minion I =
dont remember who
> 
> 
> From: Sandy 
> Sent: Friday, February 12, 2010 10=
:33 PM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Recovering Rodimus
> 
> 
> =
  
> From what Kenzo had told him, Tucson could now put two and two togethe=
r and now realized that his restoration abilities along with his skills as =
a warrior, would be needed more than ever. To him Restoration was more than=
 just restoring artifacts, making them appear and work like new, it was als=
o about restoring old programming and recovery of important data. He did no=
t know the extent of the corruption upon which was placed on Rodimus but he=
 knew he couldn't just throw in the towel on his leader. Autobots stuck tog=
ether, and through thick and thin, he'd keep his pledge to never abandon hi=
s fellow Autobots. He also realized that if he was going to get anywhere, h=
e'd have to do it himself. 
> 
> "On second thought, I think I'll go this o=
ne alone. Don't wait up for me, I don't think I'll be back too soon."
> 
> =
He bids Kenzo good bye and walks out of the room. 
> 
> "Oh before I forget=
, have the CR chamber prepared for Rodimus. He'll need it more than me." 
>=
 
> He was dead set on recovering his leader. And this time, nothing and no=
 one would get in his way of achieving his mission. He sends one final mess=
age to Lord Perseus.
> 
> "Lord Perseus, it's come to my attention that my =
leader, Rodimus Prime, has been abducted and altered severely. This puts th=
e Matrix of Leadership at a grave Risk, but most of all, his spark, which I=
 believe is too precious to waste for evil purposes. I can not abandon my l=
eader, not even in his corruptive state. I hereby announce that I am on rou=
te to locating my leader, and I DO intend to BRING HIM BACK. Hopefully, the=
 damage can be reversed. If not, there is question of the well being of the=
 Matrix. I must recover it, perhaps not for my own personal gain, but for t=
he benefit of Autobot kind. It's too precious to lose to the hands of those=
 who thirst for power and greed. I swear by Primus's name, I will return, b=
ut my return may not be a fast one. May Primus guide you as he guides me. T=
his is Tucson, signing off. I will report to you again, once I know more of=
 the condition of my leader."
> 
> He signs off, gets off the ship, and tra=
nsforms into SUV mode, hoping to find Rodimus via his sonar systems.
> 
> T=
ag: Kraftlos and Cyclonus.
>
